name: Candlestick
description: An antique brass candlestick, heavy enough to bludgeon a man with.

name: Dagger
description: An eight inch, double-sided, silver dagger with a black handle.

name: Lead Pipe
description: A thick, lead pipe, removed from any sort of practical plumbing application.

name: Revolver
description: An antique revolver that looks to still be in working condition.

name: Rope
description: A four foot length of thick, hemp rope.

name: Wrench
description: A rusty, old wrench with a good heft to it.
